txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Pure black fur from the bears surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund. Deliver the items to Fotri, overseer of the settlement.
'We will use this wisely. Thank you.'
'We use the skins and fur from the beasts to patch clothing and armour. We could certainly use them now.'
Thorin's Hall Task: Pure Black Fur
Fotri, overseer of the dwarves of Forochel, awaits the delivery of pure black fur at the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
Deliver the pure black fur to Fotri at Zigilgund in Forochel

You have accepted a task to collect and deliver pure black fur from the bears in the areas surrounding Zigilgund in Forochel. The items are to be delivered to the dwarf-overseer Fotri encamped at the dwarf-home.
Wanted: Pure black fur from the bears surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
